channel.title: Trackmania Nations | MITB Dedicated Server up!
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XNQBvtN6cns http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyKapaubX3w&NR=1 - 250 simultaneous players
Orssim free arcade racing game with ladder system and tons of content, i recommend for everyone! It has a built in map editor and skin editor for cars as well.
Also, add me in-game: Speljohan.
PS: If you want the pay version you can buy a cdkey from: http://www.g2play.net/ for half the price they have on website, i bought a key today and it works great! Keep in mind you'll have to download the actual game from torrent or sumshit tho.
We now have a dedicated server, in-game you can simple go to "Play Online", then USA -> Texas and you'll find "MITB Racers". Password: cocks
You can probably access the game using the following in your webbrowser as well: tmtp://#join=mitbserv
Now enjoy yourselves!

item.title: Trackmania Nations | MITB Dedicated Server up!
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

After beating Baros Rocks for the 10th time, I decided to go compile a mappack mostly created by users of fok.nl, but also some maps I’ve used to play on.
Download it here.
To install the pack, unzip it to My Documents/Trackmania/Tracks/Challenges. Ignore the ChallengeInfo.txt unless you’re running a dedi.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:17, topic:324263”][quote author=.Unlimited link=topic=420665.msg3092179#msg3092179 date=1262985387]
http://www.trackmania-carpark.com/

You can download cars from there and use those.

A really good game and the maps can be epic crazy.
[/quote]
I think that’s for united though, not for nations(united is the paid version, nations is the free)[/quote]

Nope they work, at least I see the cars that I download which is all that really matters.
